Lab 2: Custom Code Analysis

Prerequisites

We will be using our totallysecureapp project, which is available at https://github.com/cxworkshops/totallysecureapp. If you have not already done so, clone the project to your local machine, as defined in Lab 1.

Introduction

SAST, or Static Application Security Testing, enables developers and security teams to scan application source code to find, index, and enumerate weaknesses that lead to vulnerabilities within the application. Checkmarx supports over 30 languages and frameworks
